attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
To all Senior Citizens we as a group are very much underestimated by all poltical parties I ask you lovely people out there to support me in an effort to get better Pensions for all in this age group We want our pensions to be in line with the best in the EU not at the bottom of the ladder charity begins at home not abroad This government needs to put right what is so wrong with the pension system in this Country of ours do do not give themselves big rises give it to the people in this Country who deserved to be treated a great deal better We as a group of some three million plus people plus need a voice in Parliment perhaps a  Pensioners party  not such a stupid Idea Enough Pensioners standing up to be counted could well make the powers that be sit up and take notice as a group we have a big voice in this country we have all heard the Blair pledges in the past we are now getting more of the same from this new PM let him know just how you feel about your Pensions plus council Tax and heating allowanceTHEY ARE THERE TO SERVE THE PUBLIC NOT THE OTHER WAY ROUND Unite my friends out there 
Let the GREY BRIGADE take the fight to the PM as Seniors we deserve better treatment God Bless You All.

rejection.details: Please redraft the main sentence "a call for action" to include a clear action for HM Government
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
